schema.description: 起始业务日期，精确到天。您需要使用yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ的UTC格式。
截止业务日期，精确到天。您需要使用yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ的UTC格式。

RequestId.description: 每次请求生成的唯一标识。

Date.description: 业务日期对应的时间戳。

403.errorMessage: You are not authorized to access the resources.
Access is forbidden. Please first activate DataWorks Enterprise Edition or Flagship Edition.

429.errorMessage: The request for this resource has exceeded your available limit.
The request for this resource has exceeded your daily available limit.
You have reached the limit for the resource. Please contact us by submitting a ticket.
The DataWorks system is busy. Try again later.
Your request is too frequent. Try again later.

500.errorMessage: The dataworksAPI service is not available in this area. Please try it in another area.
An internal system error occurred. Try again later.
An internal system error occurred. Try again later.
You have not joined any project.

title: 获取周期实例数量的趋势
summary: 调用GetInstanceCountTrend获取周期实例数量的趋势。
